ONEIS | London, UK | Full-time, work from home welcomed

We're a small and ambitious team, seeking a generalist developer with expertise in building web applications.

Our company is funded solely from income from our clients. So perhaps this is a role for someone who wants the freedom to do things right and the potential for the job to grow in whatever way they want, but avoid some of the uncertainty of an investor-funded startup.

Full details: http://www.oneis.co.uk/jobs

The email address there goes directly to me; feel free to ask questions informally.
